Australian payment processing platform f: 澳大利亚直接借记、信用卡和定期付款的支付处理平台。 创建付款人，处理支付，管理订阅，并使用全面Web钩子处理付款来源。
粉红色的 API 环境供使用。
Connect your Pinch Payments account\n\nT:
Connect your Pinch Payments account

This connector requires Pinch Payments API credentials. (Application ID and Secret Key)

How to generate API keys:
1. Sign in to your Pinch Payments account at https://web.getpinch.com.au
2. Navigate to API Keys: https://web.getpinch.com.au/api-keys
3. Create an Application to generate API credentials
4. Copy your Application ID and Secret Key (either live or test depending on the environment)

Authentication uses Basic Auth where:
- Username: Your Application ID
- Password: Your Secret Key
Create a new payer or update an existing: 创建新付款人或更新现有付款人
Create a real-time payment against a cre: 对信用卡或银行账户创建实时付款
Add a payment source (bank account or cr: 向现有付款人添加付款源 (银行账户或信用卡)
Create a new scheduled payment or update: 创建新的预定付款或更新现有的付款
Create a subscription between a payer an: 在付款人和计划之间创建订阅
Find a payer by their Payer ID: 通过他们的付款人ID查找一个付款人
Select an existing payer to update, or l: 选择一个现有的付款人进行更新，或者留空创建一个新的付款人
Email address of the payer: 付款人的电子邮件地址
Add a payment source (bank account or cr: 向此付款人添加付款源 (银行帐户或信用卡)
The token created by the Pinch capture s: 双指捕获脚本创建的令牌
IP address of the payer (for payment sou: 付款人的 IP 地址 (用于付款源)
Select an existing payer for this paymen: 为此付款选择一个现有的付款人
Check if you want to use an existing pay: 如果您想使用现有付款人而不是创建新付款人，请勾选此项。
Full name of the payer (use this OR Firs: 付款人的全名 (使用此或者名 + 姓)
First name of the payer (use this OR Ful: 付款人姓名 (使用此或全名)
Last name of the payer (use this OR Full: 付款人姓名 (使用此或全名)
Australian 10-digit mobile number (non-i: 澳大利亚10位移动电话号码(非国际)
Payment amount in cents (e.g., $10.50 =: 以分数计算的付款额(例如10.50美元=1050)
Optional additional fee in cents (Manage: 可选的额外手续费分数(仅管理商家)
Optional description for the payment (vi: 付款的可选描述(对付款人可见，最多1000个字符)
Existing payment source ID to use (leave: 使用的现有付款源 ID (留空以使用默认值或创建新源)
Credit card or bank account token from c: 来自抓取脚本的信用卡或银行账户令牌 (用于新的付款源)
Select source types to surcharge (pass f: 选择要附加费用的源类型 (传递费用给客户)
Optional one-time-use reference to preve: 可选的一次性使用参考，以防止重复提交
Free text field for storing state or acc: 用于存储状态或会计集成数据的免费文本字段
Select the payer to add a payment source: 选择付款人添加付款源
Use a token from the capture script inst: 使用捕获脚本中的令牌而不是手动银行账户详细信息
The token created by the Pinch capture s: 粉红色捕获脚本创建的令牌 (银行账户和信用卡)
IP address of the payer (required for to: 付款人的 IP 地址 (基于令牌的来源所需)
The bank account number (only for manual: 银行账户号 (仅用于手动银行账户记录)
The BSB (Bank-State-Branch) number (only: BSB (银行-国家-分支) 号码 (仅用于手动银行账户入账)
The name on the bank account (only for m: 银行账户上的名称 (仅用于手动银行账户输入)
Enter an existing payment ID to update,: 输入现有付款ID以更新，或留空以创建新付款
Select the payer for this scheduled paym: 选择此预定付款的付款人
Optional: ID of the payment source to us: 可选：要使用的付款源ID。如果省略，将使用第一个有效的来源
Required for percentage-based plans: tot: 按百分比计算的计划所需：以分数计算的总金额（例如，100.00美元=10000美元）
When the subscription should start. Leav: 当订阅开始时, 留空以便立即启动
Optional: Specific payment source ID to: 可选：将要使用的特定付款源 ID。如果省略，将自动选择一个源
The Subscription ID in sub_XXXXXXXXXXXXX: 子_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 格式的订阅 ID
Triggers when a bank account transaction: 当银行账户交易返回时触发(可能导致丧失信誉)
Triggers when a new payer record is crea: 创建新付款人记录时触发
Triggers when a payer record is updated: 付款人记录更新时触发
Triggers when a payment is created (via: 创建付款时触发(通过保存付款端点或订阅)
Triggers when a subscription is created: 为付款人创建订阅时触发
Triggers when a subscription is run to c: 当订阅运行到完成时触发
Triggers when a refund is updated (e.g.,: 当退款更新时触发(如状态改变)
Triggers when scheduled payments are pro: 处理预定付款时触发器 (每日在工作日)
Triggers when a transfer is created to s: 当创建转账以结算资金给商人时触发
